markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Doblagub (Elder Brughadatch)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=529)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Elder brughadatches command groups of fellow brughadatches, who placate the doblagub with fresh meals and trophies of the group’s grisly catches.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 31

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Doblagub](/Monsters.aspx?ID=529)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 79</row>

**Perception** +26; darkvision, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +26, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +3

**Con** +6

**Int** +2

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +7
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +26 

</row>

**HP** 250

**Weaknesses**
cold iron 15

**Etheric Fibers** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 40 feet. **Requirements** A doblagub has bonded with their current location by being called there via a ritual or by remaining in one place for 10 years; **Effect** The doblagub grows etheric fibers that they can use to psychically keep prey close. Any time a creature tries to move within this aura, it must succeed at a DC 30 Will save or the movement fails and the action is wasted.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +27 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d8+14 bludgeoning plus Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +27 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** Grab and Pull 10 feet

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 33, attack +27
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236)
- **3rd**
[Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (x2), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (at will), [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (at will), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) (x2), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) (x3)
- **5th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) (x2), [Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=161) (at will), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)
- **6th**
[Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)
- **Constant (6th)**
[True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Etheric Tug** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The doblagub’s etheric fibers aura is active; **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** All non-brughadatch creatures within the aura must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or be pulled 10 feet toward the doblagub.

**Magical Tongue**   A doblagub can use their tongue to make spell attacks with spells that have a range of touch.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Medium, 4d10+8 bludgeoning, Rupture 24

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-123" />
name: Doblagub

</traits>

<additional-info>

</summary>
